title: Defenders of the Aurora
tagline: Truth shines brightest in the darkest hours
mpaa_rating_content: This film contains mild action and some thematic elements
critic_review: Defenders of the Aurora' delivers a family-friendly adventure that soars on the wings of its earnest, endearing characters. Bearrymore and Croissant exhibit palpable chemistry, ensuring audiences of all ages will find something to cheer for. Birdman's direction provides a welcome nod to classic superhero tales, encapsulating both whimsy and wisdom in this polar quest for truth.
description: In the ancient icy reaches of a castle enshrouded in mystery, 'Defenders of the Aurora' follows the thrilling journey of Lars Frostgaard (John Bearrymore), a righteous politician by day and a daring superhero by night, and his trusty sidekick, Hakon Chillblade (Russell Croissant), a clever lawyer with a heart of gold. Together, they must clear Lars' name after he's wrongly accused of a crime he didn't commit, battling against time in the dungeon-like depths of their chilling, historical homeland. Directed by the visionary Ingmar Birdman, this tale of justice and friendship will warm your heart like the northern lights and prove that heroes come in the most unexpected forms.
object_prompt: Create a title, tagline, and Passionate description teaser of a MPAA PG rated movie. Starring John Bearrymore and Russell Croissant as the main characters. Directed by Ingmar Birdman. A Politician/Lawyer at Historical Site (Castle/Dungeon) in Guilty Pleasure Superhero with a Innocent Accused make the character names of Arctic origin. Provide what the movie contains which is the reason for the rating. The title, tagline and description should be consistent with the rating of the movie. Provide a critic score between 1 and 10 as critic_score. Provide a critic review as critic_review. Output result as json, title as the title property, tagline as the tagline property, rating as mpaa_rating, rating reason as rating_content, assign it a single word genre as genre, description as the description property.
image_prompt: A mystical castle set against the backdrop of the shimmering northern lights, with two silhouetted figures standing boldly at the forefront, one cloaked in a politician"s attire reflecting the day and the other in a sidekick"s costume reflecting the night, both facing the icy expanse of their homeland.
